title: Top Places to visit in Uttara Kannada, Karwar, Karnataka
content: Uttara Kannada/ North Canara is a district in the Indian state of Karnataka. It is bordered by the state of Goa and Belagavi District to the north, Dharwad District and Haveri District to the east, Shivamogga District and Udupi District to the south, and the Arabian Sea to the west. Top Places to visit in Alappuzha, Alleppey, Kerala
content: Alappuzha, also known by its former name Alleppey, is the administrative headquarters of Alappuzha District in the Indian State of Kerala. Alappuzha is a city and a municipality in Kerala with an urban population of 174,164 and ranks third among the districts in literacy rate in the State of Kera

title: Top Places to visit in Ernakulam, Kakkanad, Kerala
content: Ernakulam refers to the central, mainland portion of the city of Kochi in central Kerala, India and has lent its name to the Ernakulam district. The Kerala High Court, the office of the Kochi Municipal Corporation and the Cochin Stock Exchange are situated here. The Ernakulam Junction is a major

title: Top Places to visit in Idukki, Painavu, Kerala
content: Idukki is one of the 14 districts of Kerala state, India, created on 26 January 1972 bifurcating Kottayam District. At that time, the district headquarters was at Kottayam. title: Top Places to visit in Kannur, Kerala
content: Kannur (also known by its former names Cannanore and Portuguese name Cananor) is a city and a Municipal Corporation in Kannur district, state of Kerala, India. title: Top Places to visit in Kasaragod, Kerala
content: Kasaragod is a municipal town and the district headquarters of Kasaragod district of Kerala state in India. title: Top Places to visit in Kottayam, Kerala
content: Kottayam is a city in the Indian state of Kerala. It is the district headquarters of Kottayam district, located in south-west Kerala. It had a population of 136,812 in the city's administrative limits according to the 2011 census. Kottayam is approximately 146 km north of Thiruvananthapuram, Kera

title: Top Places to visit in Kozhikode, Kerala
content: Kozhikode, also known as Calicut, is a city in Kerala, India and the headquarters of the Kozhikode district. title: Top Places to visit in Malappuram, Kerala
content: Malappuram (also Malapuram) is a city in the Indian state of Kerala, spread over an area of 33.61 km2 (12.98 sq mi).
